body_content.explanation: A multifocal lens (= a curved piece of glass or plastic) allows you to see things clearly at different distances away from them:
examples: As they pass age 40, many people will need multi-focal lenses to help them focus on both near and far objects at work.

body_content.explanation: (of a disease) existing in more than one place in the body or part of the body :
examples: It was originally thought it was a multifocal cancer, each developing individually.
Someone with multifocal breast cancer has more than one invasive tumour in one area of their breast.
